review: Its is just what I needed.  Thanks for coming up with such a cool add on.
author: Ellen

review: It is the best  39 dollars ever spent, works super super well. I am cutting the cord from dish, better picture and sound quality and a tremendous range. The only caveat is that it needs more apps but otherwise, it is very effective. Can use remote or use my ipad to control the stick.5 stars!!!
author: Arturo

review: Excellent, have not had any problems.
author: Emery S

review: So far this has been great.
author: Lee Campbell

review: Great little device for the Tv. Really wish it was USB Powered.
author: Kevin Fitzgerald

review: So I purchased this to place in my living room as my Google Chromecast is in the bedroom. It works fairly well as a streaming stick but I do have some slight problems with it. First off it's a lot slower than my Chromecast  and buffers a bit more. The second issue is that apps in it will crash to the home screen on random occasions. Finally the lack of Vudu support is unfortunate.
author: Seth Chick

review: It installed in a matter of minutes and was easy to navigate. Offers a lot of great programs to watch. Definitely makes prime worth it.
author: KFed1

review: Small, compact, easy to use, fast!! Needed Netflix and Amazon Prime for our Vizio (non smart tv). What an inexpensive and simple addition.  Just what I was looking for.  Can easily take this on trips as long at the TV has HDMI slot. Love it!
author: beaufam
